entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 2:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
